markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Death Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=64)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 328 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodline**
[Psychopomp](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=13)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 living creature touched
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You shield a creature from the ravages of negative energy. It receives a +4 status bonus to saves against [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) and [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) effects, gains negative resistance 10, and suppresses the effects of the [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) condition.
name: Death Ward

summary: Protect a creature against negative energy.
summary_markdown: Protect a creature against negative energy.
text: Death Ward Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 328 4.0 Traditions Divine, Occult, Primal Bloodline Psychopomp Cast somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 living creature touched Duration 10 minutes --- You shield a creature from the ravages of negative energy. It receives a +4 status bonus to saves against death and negative effects, gains negative resistance 10, and suppresses the effects of the doomed condition.
